history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01241
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CONSTITUTING A CONSTITUTIONAL CONVENTION TO AMEND THE 1987 PHILIPPINE CONSTITUTION, DEFINING QUALIFICATIONS FOR ITS DELEGATES WHO SHALL BE ELECTED SIMULTANEUOSLY WITH THE BARANGAY OR NATIONAL ELECTIONS, APPROPRIATING FUNDS FOR ITS OPERATIONS, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : Constitutional Convention Act Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Seeks to call for a Constitutional Convention, the delegates of which shall be elected by the people simultaneously with the next Barangay or National elections.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VILLAFUERTE, LUIS RAYMUND JR. F.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-05
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Batocabe (066 2017-02-06)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
MOTHER BILL: HCR0009
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON CONSTITUTIONAL AMENDMENTS ON 2016-08-01
